## ReportingExceptionHandlerOptions class

Options that are used within ReportingExceptionHandler

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReportingExceptionHandlerOptions 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [captureHtmlInputs](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.capturehtmlinputs.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that current html inputs state should be transformed into html |
|  [captureScreenHtml](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.capturescreenhtml.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that current html snapshot should be captured |
|  [captureScreenImage](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.capturescreenimage.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that screenshot should be taken when error occurs |
|  [debugMode](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.debugmode.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether should logger log errors also in browser console |
|  [enableServerLogging](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.enableserverlogging.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether should be server logging enabled or not |
|  [showAlsoAlert](./error-handling.reportingexceptionhandleroptions.showalsoalert.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that also alert should show error message |
